Articles.Content: Everybody knows the stock solid fuel seperator which can be used for seperating side attached parts/boosters. It has been around for several years now and i.m.o. isn't very realistic. So couldn't somebody please design and create a better seperator?
I wish there was a decoupler that had an integrated sepatron.

Theres several mods around that have improved versions of that separatron and some have stronger ullage motors which are essentially powerful separatrons.

The ones that I have are from MRS, SpaceY Heavy Lifters, and KWrocketry. Theres a small SRB from Karbonite that could potentially be used as a separatron, but I haven't tried it myself.

- - - Updated - - -

I wish there was a decoupler that had an integrated sepatron.

SpaceY has those: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/100408-1-0-2-SpaceY-Heavy-Lifter-Parts-Pack-v0-14-1-%282015-05-28%29 They're radial though, I don't know if you meant inline.

Edited May 29, 2015 by smjjames
